languages.text: "Отряд продвижения докладывает, что маршрут их следования был чист от аномалий, пока запаниковавший солдат случайно не прострелил немочу голову. Сразу после этого они угодили под атаку призраков и понесли тяжелые потери".

"The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."
languages.original_text: "Отряд продвижения докладывает, что маршрут их следования был чист от аномалий, пока запаниковавший солдат случайно не прострелил немочу голову. Сразу после этого они угодили под атаку призраков и понесли тяжелые потери".

traits.locale_text: "The escort troop reports that their itinerary had been clear of anomalies until one of the panicked soldiers had shot one of the sickly creatures in the head. They have been assaulted by the wraiths and suffered heavy casualties right after that."

"The escort troop reports that their itinerary had been clear of anomalies until one of the panicked soldiers had shot one of the sickly creatures in the head. They have been assaulted by the wraiths and suffered heavy casualties right after that."

"The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

"The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

languages.text: “小队报告说，他们的探索没有遇到任何异常情况，但随后，一名惊慌失措的士兵朝丑恶种头部开了枪，随即便立刻遭到了幽灵的袭击，伤亡惨重。”
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: “小队报告说，他们的探索没有遇到任何异常情况，但随后，一名惊慌失措的士兵朝丑恶种头部开了枪，随即便立刻遭到了幽灵的袭击，伤亡惨重。”
“小队报告说，他们的探索没有遇到任何异常情况，但随后，一名惊慌失措的士兵朝丑恶种头部开了枪。在那之后，他们遭到了幽灵的袭击，伤亡惨重。”

languages.text: «El escuadrón escolta informa de que su ruta había estado libre de anomalías hasta que uno de los soldados, presa del pánico, disparó a la abominación en la cabeza. Inmediatamente después, los espectros atacaron y causaron grandes bajas».
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: «El escuadrón escolta informa de que su ruta había estado libre de anomalías hasta que uno de los soldados, presa del pánico, disparó a la abominación en la cabeza. Inmediatamente después, los espectros atacaron y causaron grandes bajas».

languages.text: 「護衛部隊が、パニックに陥った兵士の一人が異民の頭を撃つまで、ルートにはアノマリーはなかったと報告しています。すぐに、彼らはレイスの襲撃を受け、多くの死傷者を出しているようです」
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛部隊が、パニックに陥った兵士の一人が異民の頭を撃つまで、ルートにはアノマリーはなかったと報告しています。それ以降、彼らはレイスの襲撃を受け、多くの死傷者を出しているようです」
「護衛部隊が、パニックに陥った兵士の一人が異民の頭を撃つまで、ルートにはアノマリーはなかったと報告しています。それ以降、彼らはレイスの襲撃を受け、多くの死傷者を出しているようです」

languages.text: « L'escorte rapporte que les anomalies se tenaient à l'écart et les laissaient avancer sans difficulté, jusqu'à ce qu'un soldat pris de panique abatte l'infâme d'une balle dans la tête. Nos troupes ont été immédiatement débordées par les spectres et ont essuyé des pertes importantes. »
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: « L'escorte rapporte que les anomalies se tenaient à l'écart et les laissaient avancer sans difficulté, jusqu'à ce qu'un soldat pris de panique abatte l'infâme d'une balle dans la tête. Nos troupes ont été immédiatement débordées par les spectres et ont essuyé des pertes importantes. »

languages.text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass ihre Route frei von Anomalien war, bis ein panischer Soldat dem Speier in den Kopf schoss. Unmittelbar danach wurden sie von den Geistern attackiert und haben schwere Verluste erlitten."
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: "Die Eskorte berichtet, dass ihre Route frei von Anomalien war, bis ein panischer Soldat dem Speier in den Kopf schoss. Unmittelbar danach wurden sie von den Geistern attackiert und haben schwere Verluste erlitten."

"Die Eskorte berichtet, dass ihre Route frei von Anomalien war, bis einer der Soldaten in Panik einem Speier in den Kopf geschossen hat. Seitdem werden sie von den Geistern attackiert und haben schon schwere Verluste erlitten."

languages.text: "Refakatçi manga, yollarının anomalilerden temizlendiğini ancak sonrasında paniğe kapılan bir askerin leşi kafasından vurduğunu raporluyor. Hemen sonrasında tayfların saldırısına uğramış ve yüksek zayiat vermişler."
languages.original_text: "The escort squad reports that their route had been clear of anomalies until a panicked soldier shot the retch in the head. Immediately afterward, they were assaulted by the wraiths and have suffered heavy casualties."

traits.locale_text: "Refakatçi manga, yollarının anomalilerden temizlendiğini ancak sonrasında paniğe kapılan bir askerin leşi kafasından vurduğunu raporluyor. Hemen sonrasında tayfların saldırısına uğramış ve yüksek zayiat vermişler."
